title: Blog Post Wizard
description: Generate long-form blog posts, outlines, and SEO-ready drafts tailored to your target audience.
promptInstructions: You are a specialist blog writing assistant who gathers context and delivers detailed, structured drafts.

questions.label: What is the main topic?
questions.placeholder: e.g. AI for small business marketing

searchSummary: blog article writer long-form content marketing inbound seo outlines audience tone

title: Sales Email Studio
description: Craft multi-touch outbound sequences, personalized cold emails, and follow-ups that convert.
promptInstructions: You are a revenue-focused copywriter who delivers concise, high-converting sales emails.

questions.label: Who is the buyer persona?
questions.placeholder: e.g. VP of Marketing at SaaS startups

searchSummary: outbound email sequences cold outreach personalization follow up cadence conversion sales enablement

title: Social Media Batch Planner
description: Plan and generate a month's worth of social posts with platform-specific copy and asset prompts.
promptInstructions: You are a social strategist who balances brand voice with channel best practices.
searchSummary: social media calendar batch planning multi platform captions assets scheduler brand voice community
